a.title: Internet & Computer Networks Acceptable Use Policy
a.span: Internet & Computer Networks Acceptable Use Policy

li.a: Internet & Computer Networks Acceptable Use Policy

h1.strong: ​Check the area below often for important news and information.

span.strong: Congratulations to Central Public Schools - Teacher of the Year!
Starting Monday, April 6th, please see the area "SCHOOL APPS" above and then click on "Distance/Continuous Learning". Here you will find information and lessons by grade.

strong.span: Please be sure and check out our new Elementary After School Program website. It will contain lots of fun learning ideas that will be updated frequently to enrich your distance learning experience. Click HERE to be taken to the website or the link is also on our Distance/Continuous Learning page under the "SCHOOL APPS" tab above.

span.strong: Grades 7-12: Final homework packets can be picked up on Monday, April 13th from 9 am to 12 pm in the elementary parking lot. Please remain in your car and the packets will be brought to you. These packets will contain work for the rest of the year.

p.span: "Grab & Go" meals are free to all children 18 and under. Beginning Monday, April 6, 2020 these meals can be picked up on Mondays and Wednesdays from 9 am to noon at the cafeteria. On Monday pickup will be for meals for Monday and Tuesday. On Wednesday pickup will be for meals for Wednesday, Thursday and Friday. Please remain in your car and the meals will be brought to you. Thank you!

h4.span: This confidential survey is to collect information that will allow our staff to plan for distance learning. On April 6, student learning will be done outside of school buildings, which have been closed statewide to contain the spread of the coronavirus.

We want to ensure that we are equipped to transition to a distance learning environment in a way that meets the needs of all families. Your responses will help us determine how to best ensure your child continues to learn and grow until schools can open again.

span.span: Please click here to complete the survey.

img.style: font-size: 20px; color: rgb(95, 73, 122); left: 116px; width: 332px; height: 53px;

strong.span: Our school utilizes the SchoolMessenger system to deliver text messages straight to your mobile phone with important information about events, school closings, safety alerts and more. Contact the school to find out how you can opt-in to receive these messages.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
